summary: Galindra is a beautiful Breton follower. She is not standalone which means you will need ApachiiSkyhair v_1_3 in order to make her work properly.
descriptionHtml:
Greetings everyone! Here is my first mod, a female follower named Galindra. Sadly i couldn\'t make her standalone because my knowledge for followers is a bit limited at the time. However i may achieve make her standalone in near future.

Feautures: Essential 
                Autolevel (10-120)
                151 health/stamina/magicka
                Marriable 
                1handed
Location: Riverwood----->Sleeping giant inn
 
You\'ll need the following hair mod in order to make her work (the ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1]ApachiiSkyhair[/url]
and if you\'re afraid of ctd here is a must have:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33526/?]ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer[/url]

 The rest as skin, eyes, face, body type will be determined by the ones you already use, so she may not look exactly as she is in the pictures.

 Here\'s a list of the mods i used to make her:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986/?]Skin[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34213/?]Body[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30823/?]Eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]Hair[/url] (required!)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35125/?]Dress[/url] (not included)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483/?]Face normalmaps[/url]
If you want the exact look you have to use the mods listed above, but please notice they will replace yours (skin, body, eyes, normalmaps)

Credits to the mods authors: zzjay
                                        Maevan2
                                        Halendia
                                        Apachii
                                        calyps
                                      Thank you^^
author: evilia3
